content.raw:
will do.  for some reason I stayed away from singular because of what happened to `sensor_msgs::JointState` :)

Should the corresponding ros topic change from `/atlas/atlas_states` to `/atlas/state`?
content.html:
will do. for some reason I stayed away from singular because of what happened to sensor_msgs::JointState :)

Should the corresponding ros topic change from /atlas/atlas_states to /atlas/state?

content.raw:
Good idea.  I think what I'll do here is skip filling out the `name[]` array as they are taken care by the enums.  And add the 6 controller gain values.  Does it make sense to use the `osrf_msgs/JointCommands` type here instead of `sensor_msgs/JointState`?

Take a look at the updated pull request and let me know what you think.  thanks.
content.html:
Good idea. I think what I'll do here is skip filling out the name[] array as they are taken care by the enums. And add the 6 controller gain values. Does it make sense to use the osrf_msgs/JointCommands type here instead of sensor_msgs/JointState?

Take a look at the updated pull request and let me know what you think. thanks.

content.raw: Suggest changing `AtlasStates.msg` to `AtlasState.msg`, as each instance of that type of message contains a single state (though multi-variate) value for all of Atlas.
content.html: Suggest changing AtlasStates.msg to AtlasState.msg, as each instance of that type of message contains a single state (though multi-variate) value for all of Atlas.
